name: Guns

name: A Safe Place

name: Murders in the Zoo
summary_text: A monomaniacal zoologist is pathologically jealous of his beautiful but unfaithful wife Evelyn and will not stop short of murder to keep her.

summary_text: Murder during film shoot sparks search for a killer.
A young cop, who works in a police control room, tries to solve the mysterious case of a kidnapped girl.
